name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Markeith AIKENS, Petitioner

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Markeith AIKENS, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner is:
(1) Did the court illegally sentence [Aikens] on unlawful contact with a minor graded as an F-l when it should have been graded as an F-3?
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
160 A.3d 781
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Markeith AIKENS, Petitioner
No. 268 EAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
November 2, 2016
